interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ESSENTRICS Body Sculpting Series Vol. 2
Review Date: 2018/05/14
Store: Gail Garceau, Meg Feeney, Amanda Cyr  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
Product Description: ['What is the key to achieving a strong, toned body? The perfect balance of strength, mobility, and flexibility. Each workout in this series will tone, stretch and work your full range of motion. Look longer, leaner, and more toned in just 30 minutes a day! Essentrics Ultimate Inner-Thigh Workout with Gail Garceau This advanced, full body toning workout is designed to target the glutes and thighs from every angle. It combines standing and floor toning exercises with an extra focus on sculpting the inner thighs—leaving your legs feeling long, lean and firm Time: 30 minutes Level: Advanced Pace: Medium to Fast Components: Standing & Floor Full Body Strengthening Workout with Amanda Cyr True strength should always involve the entire body. This short, yet effective strengthening workout is designed to test your stability, mobility and muscle power through a series of intelligently-designed, full body exercises. Feel stronger and re-energized after only one session. Time: 30 minutes Level: Advanced Pace: Medium Components: Standing & Floor Total Core, Leg & Butt Workout with Meg Feeney This fun, yet challenging, standing and floor workout will leave you visibly more toned in no time. After only 30 minutes—you will thin your waist, flatten your stomach and sculpt your legs and butt. Time: 30 minutes Level: Advanced Pace: Medium to Fast Components: Standing & Floor']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'DVD', 'Contributor': 'The Esmonde Technique, Gail Garceau, Meg Feeney, Amanda Cyr', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.56 x 5.35 x 0.63 inches; 3 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'DVD', 'Run time': '90 minutes', 'Actors': 'Gail Garceau, Meg Feeney, Amanda Cyr', 'Producers': 'The Esmonde Technique', 'Studio': 'ESSENTRICS', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Not any different than any other workout disc or tape.  I was disappointed.  I guess there is only one Miranda.
Review Title: Save you money
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

Good Buy Come Dance With Me Andrew McCarthy (Actor), Michelle Nolden (Actor), John Bradshaw (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family ["Jack (Andrew McCarthy) is an executive in a financial brokerage firm trying to impress the firm's president, Drew Clayton (Chris Gillett), in hopes of a promotion. However, Jack is dating the fabulously rich and elegant Demi Clayton (Stephanie Mills), who happens to be Drew's daughter. Although Demi's mother Clarisse (Jane Moffat) doesn't necessarily approve of Jack and would prefer her daughter to date a man within their social circle, Jack still plans on proposing. Trying to create the perfect proposal, Jack signs up for dance lessons in preparation for his proposal to Demi at her father's lavish annual Christmas Dance. But when sparks start to fly between Jack and his dance instructor, Christine (Michelle Nolden), Jack will have to make some important decisions before it is too late."] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '783536', 'Director': 'John Bradshaw', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 15, 2013', 'Actors': 'Andrew McCarthy, Michelle Nolden', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Hallmark', 'Number of discs': '1'} Very Sweet movie. profile:
**User Profile Summary Update:**

- **Primary Interest:** The user continues to prioritize mystery and thriller genres, alongside a strong inclination towards wholesome family narratives that cater to diverse audiences.
- **Recent Engagement:** Their latest purchase reflects a divergence from their usual preferences, indicating an exploration into exercise and fitness content, although they express disappointment in this particular choice.
- **Expanded Genre Exploration:** While the user remains open to various storytelling formats, their primary focus lies in uplifting tales centered on familial themes, illustrating a desire for narratives that elicit positive feelings and connections.
- **Preferred Formats:** The user typically favors DVDs, particularly animated and family-centric films that enhance shared viewing experiences. However, the recent fitness DVD suggests a willingness to engage in alternative formats that promote well-being.
- **Quality Appreciation:** They value narratives that intertwine entertainment with moral lessons and emotional depth, seeking stories that foster family bonds and provide rewarding viewing experiences.
- **Influence of Actors:** Their admiration for skilled performers enhances their enjoyment of complex characters in intricate plots, contributing to their overall viewing satisfaction.
- **Overall Trend:** Although the recent interaction signifies a temporary shift towards fitness content, the user’s consistent preference remains for charming narratives that emphasize meaningful connections, enjoyable escapism, and thoughtful engagement with a variety of storytelling styles.
